briefTitle: Effects of Iron Supplements on the Pharmacokinetics of MT-6548
officialTitle: A Clinical Pharmacological Study to Evaluate the Effects of Iron Supplements on the Pharmacokinetics of MT-6548 in Healthy Male Volunteers
summary: The objectives of this study are to investigate the pharmacokinetics and safety of MT-6548 co-administered with iron supplements in healthy male volunteers.

primaryOutcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-time Curve From Time Zero to Infinity(AUC0-âˆž) of Unchanged MT-6548
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Up to Day 8 (Cohort 1), Up to Day 5 (Cohort 2, 3)
